text: The 2016 Mountain West Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place March 9–12, 2016 at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas, Nevada. The winner of the tournament received the conference's automatic bid to the 2016 NCAA Tournament. ==Seeds== All 11 conference teams participated in the tournament. The top five seeds received first round byes. Teams were seeded by record within the conference, with a tiebreaker system to seed teams with identical conference records. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference
